title: Kenneth Cole Reaction Home Gradient Berry Area Rug at Bed Bath & Beyond
description: From Kenneth Cole Reaction Home, this rug in Gradient Berry will add a touch of adventurous, dynamic style to any room in your home. Thanks for watching.

asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.hookText:
http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/product.asp?SKU=40939346
From Kenneth Cole Reaction Home, this rug in Gradient Berry will add a touch of adventurous, dynamic style to any room in your home. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.

transcripts: Exclusively for Bed Bath and Beyond, the gradient berry area rug designed in the studios of Kenneth Cole was inspired by the urban landscape, specifically the play of light on newly poured concrete. A dense 100 percent wall high pile area rug. It has been expertly woven to enter great the subtle ombre of a rich blacken amethyst to charcoal. This area rug which is available in four sizes is easy to care for and is also available in smoke. The gradient berry area rug is part of the Kenneth Cole reaction home collection. It is available exclusively online and at select Bed Bath and Beyond stores.
